targets.query:
from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^ladung_.*_prozent$/)
  //|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^${field_keys:regex}$/) // versuch Peter
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^zentral_(temperature|error)_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^sp_ladung_zentral.*_prozent$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^mischventil_(stellwert|credit)_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^mischventil_power_W$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^mischventil_fluss_m3_h$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  //|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sp_verbrauch_W" or r._field == "sp_verbrauch_avg_W")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^${verbrauch:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^dezentral_mbus_tmp_temperature_t(1|2)_C$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "dezentral_mbus_tmp_flow_v1_m3h")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^sp_(unten|mitte|oben)_error_C$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^sp_(unten|mitte|oben)_(a|b)_ok_percent$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "modbus_ok_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  // |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Dezentral Modbus History Percent OK (100% not shown)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "uptime_s")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "next_legionellen_kill_d")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "rutschbahnhaus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "pico_ria")
//  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "anforderung" or  r._field == "zwangsladung")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "pico_ria" and r._field == "anforderung" or  r._field == "zwangsladung")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: distinct, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "distinct")

panels.title: Puent: Anforderung und Zwangsladung, alte Heizung, gemessen

targets.query:
from(bucket: "rutschbahnhaus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "pico_anna")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "anforderung" or  r._field == "zwangsladung")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: distinct, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "distinct")

panels.title: Bochs: Anforderung und Zwangsladung, alte Heizung (gemessen)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: "heizung",
    tag: "etappe",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.label: Etappe
list.name: etappe

    start: -1d
